pages.title: Electrolyzer
pages.text: The <item>Electrolyzer/$ is a way of allowing <thing>$(l:intro/alchemy)reactions/$ to occur in <item>$(l:alchemy/glassware)manual glassware/$ in a charged environment. It acts like a more expensive <item>$(l:alchemy/glassware)glassware stand/$ that accepts FE (Forge Energy) on all sides. It will drain 10FE/t, regardless of whether it is active, and any <item>$(l:alchemy/glassware)florence flask/$ placed inside will allow <thing>$(l:intro/alchemy)reactions

<thing>$(l:intro/alchemy)/$ that need a charged environment (these <thing>$(l:intro/alchemy)reactions/$ are shown by a lightning bolt symbol in the JEI recipe page).$(br2)It drains 10FE/t at all times, and has a capacity of 100FE.
